title: Data processing: an introduction
creator_credit: Coronet Instructional Films and Dick Larson
brief_description: Introduces the basic data processing functions of sorting data, collating material and calculating, beginning with manual methods and moving into punched card equipment. With electronic computer systems, we learn ways of increasing the speed and flexibility of processing, resulting in faster ways of handling greater quantities of data.
